lead_paragraph: PAPERT--Fred. The Board of Directors and staff of Henry Street Settlement mourn the death of Fred Papert, a longtime member of our Board of Directors. We are grateful for his generous support, leadership, and friendship, and extend our deepest condolences to his family. 1/3
